header.title: CosTransactions_TransactionFactory

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosTransactions::TransactionFactory interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosTransactions/include/CosTransactions.hrl").

desc.p: This operation creates a new top-level transaction.

list.item: N (integer() > 0) - the transaction will be subject to being rolled back if it does not complete before N seconds have elapsed.
